# confidence

**Instance Property**

The level of confidence in the observation’s accuracy of smudge detection on a lens.

## Declaration

```swift
let confidence: Float
```

## Discussion

The framework normalizes this value to `[0, 1]`, where `1` represents the most confident. When results come from a [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/CoreMLRequest], the relevant [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML] models forward the confidence values.

## Inspecting an observation

- **description**: A textual representation of this instance.
- **RequestDescriptor**: A type that describes the request and revision combination.
